nodes.text: The Triellus Trade Route was a hyperspace route in the galaxy, controlled by the Hutt Cartel. It intersected with the Llanic Spice Run at Llanic, as well as with the Manda Merchant Run at Molavar. It was one of the three spice routes that formed the Spice Triangle trade network used by smugglers, it passed through Tatooine to Roon. Because the Hutts allied with the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems was unable to use the route to connect its spinward and trailing territories, leaving them especially vulnerable to siege.
